itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest comedian Steve Byrne as he discusses the most horrific Saturday Night Live audition tape disaster ever, what it's like working with Vince Vaughn, why Ross thought Steve's Wikipedia got hacked, why he's leaving Los Angeles, and why he stopped being politically correct on stage.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest comedian Steve Byrne as he discusses the most horrific Saturday Night Live audition tape disaster ever, what it's like working with Vince Vaughn, why Ross thought Steve's Wikipedia got hacked, why he's leaving Los Angeles, and why he stopped being politically correct on stage.

Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest comedian Steve Byrne as he discusses the most horrific Saturday Night Live audition tape disaster ever, what it's like working with Vince Vaughn, why Ross thought Steve's Wikipedia got hacked, why he's leaving Los Angeles, and why he stopped being politically correct on stage.
